results.content: This course is ok. The course creator is knowledgeable but he fast-forwards his work, and sometimes skips parts of the courses which caused me confusion and got stuck a number of times. very often he doesn't "Teach" the course, but goes over everything, expecting that the students know everything, this feels more like revision than learning. I could NOT recommend this course to anyone
